fields.name: There is nothing for me to steal:
Abilities:
fields.value: - Reduce a target to nothingness, dealing an Overkill attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone who visits your target at night cannot act for the next 2 nights.
- Anyone who visits your target at night receives no info that night.
- Roleblock Immune.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__
